participant_1.background: i'm not a good swimmer at all. i'm a vegan and i love hummus. hello i just moved here from germany. i love rollercoasters and sky diving.

participant_2.personality: Laid-back and easy-going, Jake enjoys the simple pleasures in life and values his close connections with friends and family.
participant_2.background: my favorite band is the who. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i have never been out of ohio. i work for our local supermarket. i've a cat named spook.
